about_the_game:
Welcome to Infinity Blaster, the ultimate space adventure! In this action-packed 2D horizontal scroller, you'll battle your way through a galaxy filled with dangerous enemies and obstacles.

Upgrade your weapons and equipment to become even more powerful and take on the toughest challenges. Fight against hordes of regular enemies, as well as challenging elite foes that will push your skills to the limit.


Start your journey with a global leaderboard, competing against your friends and players worldwide to see how you stack up against the best. For an even greater challenge, try the hardcore mode, where you only get one life to make it as far as you can.


But the battle never ends in Infinity Blaster. Every time you defeat the last boss, the game starts over with enemies that are even harder to kill than before.


With tons of achievements to unlock and detailed statistics tracking your progress, Infinity Blaster offers endless hours of gameplay. Can you master every challenge and become the ultimate space adventurer?

With its cool "retro" graphics, immersive sound effects, and intense gameplay, Infinity Blaster will keep you hooked for hours on end. So what are you waiting for? Strap on your space suit, power up your blaster, and get ready for the fight of your life!

Features

  • Upgradable weapons and equipment
  • Variety of regular enemies and challenging elite foes
  • Global leaderboard to compete with players from around the world
  • Hardcore mode for an even greater challenge
  • 100 achievements to unlock
  • Detailed statistics tracking your progress
  • Cool "retro" graphics and immersive sound effects
  • Intense gameplay that will keep you on edge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: In Infinity Blaster you blast through space, defeat challenging enemies and upgrade your weapons! Compete on the global leaderboard, survive an infinite loop of increasingly difficult foes, and unlock 100 achievements. Can you prove yourself as the ultimate space adventurer?
